code: import{LOCALHOST}from"../utils/Constants";import{getToken}from"./Login";export function sendTweetApi(message){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/tweet");var tweet={mensaje:message};var params={method:"POST",headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())},body:JSON.stringify(tweet)};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){if(response.status>=400)return{code:response.status,message:"Error al enviar el tweet, intente más tarde"};else return{code:response.status,message:"Tweet enviado!"};}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}export function getTweets(id,page){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/mytweets?id=").concat(id,"&pagina=").concat(page);var params={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())}};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}export function getTweetsFollowers(){var page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/tweets?page=").concat(page);var params={headers:{"Contenet-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken())}};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}
